description: This module introduces students to crisis and risk communication. As managing crisis situations effectively is an essential skill for communication leaders, students in this module will develop analytical skills in examining crisis situations as well as strategic communications skills to cope with risk, crisis, and issues in both online and traditional media environments. The module will highlight the latest practices and theoretical frameworks in managing crisis communication. Students will learn from case studies and guest speakers who are crisis communication experts. Students will also participate in hands-on crisis communication simulations in order to develop their crisis management skills.
title: Crisis Communications and Leadership
